pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chat and FIM with 'Codestral' // Create an addin in 'Rstudio' to do fill-in-the-middle (FIM) and chat with latest Mistral AI models for coding, 'Codestral' and 'Codestral Mamba'. For more details about 'Mistral AI API': https://docs.mistral.ai/getting-started/quickstart/ and https://docs.mistral.ai/api/. For more details about 'Codestral' model: https://mistral.ai/news/codestral; about 'Codestral Mamba': https://mistral.ai/news/codestral-mamba.
